import "/node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css";

function App() {
  const [showToast, setShowToast] = useState(false);
  const handleAddToCartToast = () => {
    setShowToast(true);
    setTimeout(() => setShowToast(false), 2e3);
  };
  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(CartProvider, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Header, null), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Router, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Routes, null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Home, { showToast: handleAddToCartToast }) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/products/:id", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(ProductDetail, { showToast: handleAddToCartToast }) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/AllProducts", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(AllProducts, { showToast: handleAddToCartToast }) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/cart", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Cart, null) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/checkout", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Checkout, null) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/products", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(AllProducts, { showToast: handleAddToCartToast }) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/category/:category", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Category, { showToast: handleAddToCartToast }) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/login", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Login, null) }), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Route, { path: "/register", element: /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Register, null) })), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(
    ToastContainer,
    {
      className: "position-fixed top-0 start-50 translate-middle-x mt-3",
      style: { zIndex: 9999 }
    },
    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(
      Toast,
      {
        show: showToast,
        onClose: () => setShowToast(false),
        bg: "success",
        delay: 3e3,
        autohide: true
      },
      /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Toast.Body, { className: "text-white" }, "âï¸ Added to cart")
    )
  )));
}
export default App;
